channel.title: Google on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Error States

item.title: 007 - The Internet of Pipes
item.description: Well now. Is it fair to call the COVID-19-initiated crisis the biggest error state of our world economy and healthcare system? To soon? Ok. I’ll write about other things, such as the internet. With many more people suddenly working from home, or simply being home without an opportunity to leave, the internet-as-infrastructure grew severely strained at the end of March. In a couple of memorable instances, it broke. [Continue Reading]
